trans-unit.target: Тут ми змінюємо світ разом Твій донат - їхня можливість!

trans-unit.source: © 2024 Volunteer Report - Online system to choose a volunteer to donate to
trans-unit.target: © 2024 Volunteer Report - Онлайн система, щоб обрати волонтера до душі

trans-unit.source: Oops! It seems, the page you are looking for does not exist.
Together we are stronger. Choose your volunteer to donate to. We believe, that will be a perfect match!
trans-unit.target: Разом сильніші. Обери волонтера до душі та донать. Віримо, буде ідеальний метч!

trans-unit.source: Of good deeds and saved lives
Learn more about their goals and provided help in their profiles with the detailed statistics of their activity based on their reports in the system
trans-unit.target: Дізнавайся про їхні цілі та надану допомогу в профілях з детальною статистикою по активності на основі їхніх звітів у системі

trans-unit.source: Log in / Register to become a part of the trustworthy community that workes miracles!
trans-unit.target: Увійди / Зареєструйся, щоб стати частиною спільноти довіри, яка творить дива!

trans-unit.source: I want to bring the Victory closer!

Detailed statistics of volunteer's spendings for
Statistics can't be counted: made no reports in the system yet 👀

... that this volunteer was accused in having a suspicious profile by another user of the website. We are investigating the issue. For now the donation link of the volunteer is hidden. Please, choose an another volunteer to donate to or come back later.
You are about to make things better

But we must warn you that following the external link to donate you take the full responsibility for possible outcomes. The Volunteer report site provides you with information and statistics, but only you decide if it is trustfull.
Accuse the volunteer in having a suspicious profile:

Please consider the limitation of 2 accusations per day>Please consider that the accusation will be reviewed by the administrator and your profile can be blocked if the accusation will be considered unfair
Describe a reason why you consider the profile to be suspicious
Please give a reasoning that is between 50 and 500 characters long
Send the accusation to the admin and temporarily block the volunteer's profile

We consider 2 accusations enough per one day. Please, come back tomorrow to report suspicious profiles. Our administrator will for sure review your accusations and give a feedback to the volunteers. Only together we can build a trustfull community!
Sort by Volunteer's Registration Date (Old is gold)
